Body: Using this project here Im able to get an esp8266 to send messages to the Azure Iot hub
column9: and I can read them with PowerBI. However
column10:
I would like to be able to use the device explorer Twin to send messages to the device.

I imagine that since the esp is sending messages to the Iot hub using an HTTP POST request
column11: that I should be able to use an HTTP GET request to read the messages sent to the device when using the correct endpoint
column13: or am I missing something? Doing this seems to only cause errors. If this is the right way
column14:
what would the format of a proper GET request be.

"

Body: Here is the POST request I'm using. It successfully sends data to the IoT hub:			POST /devices/[Device ID]/messages/events?api-version=2016-02-03 HTTP/1.1	Host: [Device Group].azure-devices.net	Authorization: SharedAccessSignature sr=[Shared Access Signature]	Content-Type: application/atom+xml;type=entry;charset=utf-8	Content-Length: 177		{Dev":"[Device ID]"
column17: Id:2}		I've tried several variations on this to try and make a valid GET request but none have worked."

Body: @ZacharyChristy Properly edit that into the question. It's unreadable inside comments,

What error are you getting? Are you using HTTPS with the correct [request URI](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/rest/api/iothub/receive-a-cloud-to-device-message) and the correct [parameters](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/rest/api/iothub/device-messaging-rest-apis#bk_common)? Have you [set the Authorization header to an appropriate SAS token](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-gb/azure/iot-hub/iot-hub-devguide-security#security-tokens)?
What does your GET request look like?

Receiving Cloud-to-Device message from Azure IoT hub via REST api you can use GET method.

Different from POST method you need use "devicebound" instead of "events" in Request URI part.

About Common parameters and headers
column9:
only Authorization header is required and it is the same with in the POST request.

There is no body required in GET request.

So
column10:
your GET request would look like this:

GET /devices/[Device ID]/messages/devicebound?api-version=2016-02-03 HTTP/1.1 	Host: [IoTHubName].azure-devices.net 	Authorization: SharedAccessSignature sr=[Shared Access Signature]
"
